edu.snu.rixk.controller

Class AttackController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.snu.rixk.controller.AttackController

  • public class AttackController
extends java.lang.Object
    AttackController This controller handles events that happen during the attack phase of Rixk.
    Version:
    $Revision$ ($Author$)
    Author:
    Tim Solum

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AttackController(GameState gameState, AttackView view)
      Builds this AttackController object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean playerBattleEvent()
      This event will manage the flow of battle and ask the player to roll dice when necessary.
      void playerChooseAttackingTerritoryEvent()
      This event tells the player to select an attacking territory from their possible choices after their target selection.
      void playerChooseTargetEvent()
      This event tells the player to select an attack target from their eligible choices.
      boolean shouldAttackStartEvent()
      This event returns whether or not the attack phase should start.
      void startFortifyEvent(FortifyView fortifyView)
      This event readies the Fortify phase.
      void startGameSummaryEvent(GameSummaryView gameSummaryView)
      This event readies the GameSummary phase.

      • AttackController

        public AttackController(GameState gameState,
                        AttackView view)
        Builds this AttackController object.
        Parameters:
        gameState - The GameState
        view - The view this controller operates on

    • Method Detail

      • shouldAttackStartEvent

        public boolean shouldAttackStartEvent()
        This event returns whether or not the attack phase should start. If the Player has no options of attack or does not want to attack this will return false.
        Returns:
        Whether or not attack phase should start

      • playerChooseTargetEvent

        public void playerChooseTargetEvent()
        This event tells the player to select an attack target from their eligible choices.

      • playerChooseAttackingTerritoryEvent

        public void playerChooseAttackingTerritoryEvent()
        This event tells the player to select an attacking territory from their possible choices after their target selection.

      • playerBattleEvent

        public boolean playerBattleEvent()
        This event will manage the flow of battle and ask the player to roll dice when necessary. It will also tell a Player who conquered a territory to move armies on to the conquered territory.
        Returns:
        Whether the game is over or not

      • startFortifyEvent

        public void startFortifyEvent(FortifyView fortifyView)
        This event readies the Fortify phase.
        Parameters:
        fortifyView - The Fortify phase coming up next

      • startGameSummaryEvent

        public void startGameSummaryEvent(GameSummaryView gameSummaryView)
        This event readies the GameSummary phase.
        Parameters:
        gameSummaryView - The GameSummaryPhase to come next
